p: Furthermore, the viral spike glycoproteins include a transmembrane anchor and a short intracellular tail at C-terminal [ 5]. ACE2 is an exopeptidase that facilitates the conversion of Angiotensin I to the nonapeptide Angiotensin 1-9 or of Angiotensin II to Angiotensin 1-7 [ 6]. Residue phenylalanine F486 in the flexible loop of RBD has relevance in the interaction with ACE2 since it penetrates into its hydrophobic pocket [ 6].
